channel.title: Making scar dissapear?
channel.description:
hey how do i make scar hide itself when its running a script?
im trying to make an auto that you can start and then use by pressing f10
i have all but the code to hide...
anyone know how to do this?

item.title: Making scar dissapear?
item.dc:creator: @iruleatants iruleatants
item.description:
@iruleatants wrote:

thanks and

[quote author=jagex_fagex link=topic=1692.msg15986#msg15986 date=1145604037]

GetSelf.Hide; // It disappears :eek:
GetSelf.Show; // It Came back :eek:

[quote]

that was funny

Read full topic

item.title: Making scar dissapear?
item.dc:creator: @jagex_fagex jagex_fagex
item.description:
@jagex_fagex wrote:

hm, i am not sure if i should post this, because it is not common knowledge but ok.

GetSelf.Hide; // It disappears :eek:
GetSelf.Show; // It Came back :eek:

so you could use;

begin GetSelf.Hide; wait(1000) GetSelf.Show; end. to test it.

If i wasn’t suppose to post it tell me and i will remove

Read full topic
